name: ONTO Wallet
shortDescription: ONTO Wallet is an all-in-one solution for Web3 to manage identity, data, and assets.
description:
ONTO Wallet is an all-in-one solution for Web3, with 1m+ registered users, 50+ supported blockchains, and an active community of 310k+ followers on Twitter, Telegram, and Discord.

The best gateway for users to manage their digital identity, data, and assets, ONTO Wallet supports 10,000+ tokens and NFTs and 1000+ dApps across 50+ leading chains. ONTO Wallet enables native cross-chain swapping and bridging, as well as an in-app NFT marketplace aggregator.

Additional features like Go+ Security reporting minimize security risks, while customized Layer 1 Web3 domain solutions provide ease of use.
